name: Feature Carousel
description: Animated feature card carousel with autoplay, swipe, and CTA support. (WIP)

use: you want a hero-style feature carousel with CTA.
you need autoplay and keyboard navigation built in.
avoid: a simple slider or list is sufficient.

patterns.title: Controller settings

theming: `FeatureCarouselThemeData` controls colors, spacing, and card styling.
accessibility: Provide clear text labels for CTA buttons.
Ensure the carousel is keyboard navigable when enabled.
do: Provide short, scannable titles and descriptions.
dont: Autoplay content without a way to pause if it contains critical info.
